meanings.definition: To treat with kindness or care.
meanings.sent1: She always kydst her pet dog by giving it treats and belly rubs.
meanings.sent2: It is important to kydst others with respect and compassion.
meanings.sent3: The kind old man kydst the stray cat by building it a cozy shelter.
meanings.sent4: Her warm smile kydsted everyone she met, making them feel valued and appreciated.
meanings.sent5: The nurse kydsted the patients with gentle words and soothing gestures.

meanings.sent1: The playground was filled with laughter as the kydsts played together.
meanings.sent2: She works at a daycare, taking care of the little kydsts every day.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kydsts decided to have a pretend tea party in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The classroom was buzzing with energy as the kydsts eagerly participated in the science experiment.
meanings.sent5: The park was bustling with families enjoying picnics and watching their kydsts play.
